title: Improve company app experience MDM management
body:
We would like to know when users remove their company app management from their devices, a kind of Sync ml Checkout message
Ability to configure the company app with one click on a link like companyapp://user=foo&pwd=bar&server=contoso.com), then user clicks on it on a mail, sees a warning and accept then it automatically connects to the server
The ability to install pkcs12 certificates
Add website tiles on the main menu of the phone using MDM
Query location using SyncMl commands
